CustomField.description: When this result is the outcome of a Job Step, that is executed as part of a Job Template, this field points to the Job Step. (note that Job Step and Function can be populated at the same time).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When this result is the outcome of a Job Step, that is executed as part of a Job Template, this fields points to the Job Step. (note that Job Step and Function can be populated at the same time)
CustomField.label: Job Step
